claimYourCalendarRewardsEvery8HoursUpTo3: Claim your calendar rewards every 8 hours, up to 3 times a day. Just a heads-up - each reward expires in 24 hours, so grab it while it lasts!
howIsBonusCalculatedDesc: The bonus is calculated based on rewards sent to your calendar, which are distributed every 8 hours for duration specified from the promotional activity.
expirationDesc: Calendar rewards must be claimed within 24 hours. Unclaimed rewards will expire.
generalTermsDesc1: Calendar rewards are calculated and credited in USDT, then displayed in your preferred fiat currency for convenience. Please note, currency conversions are approximate.
generalTermsDesc2: The casino reserves the right to modify or revoke eligibility at any time, without the obligation to justify. Any abuse or fraudulent activity will lead to disqualification from the promotion.

missions.title:
LOST
TREASURES
missions.bonusCalculationDesc: Players receive a reward for each completed conquest. One conquest will always involve unlocking a new achievement, while the remaining three consist of specific tasks—such as winning three consecutive rounds or wagering a certain amount on a certain game. Successfully completing all four conquests within a 24-hour period grants an additional bonus on top of the individual rewards.
missions.expirationDesc: Conquest Rewards must must be claimed within 24 hours before the next cycle begins. Unclaimed rewards will expire at the start of the next cycle.
missions.generalTermsDesc1: Rewards are calculated and credited in USDT, then displayed in your preferred fiat currency for convenience. Please note, currency conversions are approximate.
missions.generalTermsDesc2: The casino reserves the right to modify or revoke  eligibility at any time, without the obligation to justify. Any abuse or fraudulent activity will lead to disqualification from the promotion.

daily.title: DAILY
daily.description: Get up to 40% cashback just for playing! Every day, you’ll get a percentage of your lost coins back as Daily Cashback - so you can bounce back, keep the fun going, and play even more.
daily.claimDistributionDesc1: Cashback is accumulated in the same currency as your deposit and is credited directly to your account balance once claimed.
daily.bonusCalculationDesc: Your Daily Cashback is determined based on your net losses. The calculation process evaluates your net position while adjusting for bonuses, earnings, and other transactional activity. Depending on your VIP Rank, you can receive up to 40% cashback, credited in the currency of your deposit, sent directly to your account balance, and subject to a 1x rollover requirement.
daily.expirationDesc: Your cashback must be claimed within 24 hours before the next cashback cycle begins. Unclaimed rewards will expire at the start of the next cycle.
daily.generalTermsDesc1: Claimed cashback is sent directly to the corresponding account balance subject to a 1x rollover requirement.
daily.generalTermsDesc2: The casino reserves the right to modify or revoke  eligibility at any time, without the obligation to justify. Any abuse or fraudulent activity will lead to disqualification from the promotion.

deposit.title:
DEPOSIT
BONUS
deposit.description: Don't miss this exceptional opportunity to boost your bonus pool with increasing bonuses on your first four consecutive deposits. Each deposit unlocks a higher bonus percentage and a larger maximum reward in the currency of your choice.
deposit.depositInvitation: Deposit now and experience the best from advantage!
deposit.bonusCalculationDesc1: 1st Deposit: Get 180% in your bonus pool balance (or a whopping 300% if you register and deposit within 7 minutes) up to {{value}}
deposit.bonusCalculationDesc2: 2nd Deposit: Enjoy a 240% bonus, up to {{value}}
deposit.bonusCalculationDesc3: 3rd Deposit: Receive a 300% bonus, up to {{value}}
deposit.bonusCalculationDesc4: 4th Deposit: Score a 360% bonus, up to {{value}}
deposit.generalTermsDesc1: Rewards are calculated and credited in USDT, then displayed in your preferred fiat currency for convenience. Please note, currency conversions are approximate.
deposit.generalTermsDesc2: The casino reserves the right to modify or revoke eligibility at any time, without the obligation to justify. Any abuse or fraudulent activity will lead to disqualification from the promotion.

tournament.title: TOURNAMENT
tournament.description: Tournament Rewards are prizes given for outstanding performance in competitions. They recognize your skill and strategy, offering exciting rewards based on your final ranking and participation.
tournament.claimDistributionDesc: Reward is accumulated in the same currency as your deposit and is credited directly to your account balance once claimed.
tournament.generalTermsDesc1: Rewards are calculated and credited in USDT, then displayed in your preferred fiat currency for convenience. Please note, currency conversions are approximate.
tournament.generalTermsDesc2: The casino reserves the right to modify or revoke  eligibility at any time, without the obligation to justify. Any abuse or fraudulent activity will lead to disqualification from the promotion.

rakeback.title:
RAKEBACK
PROGRAM
rakeback.description: Get rewarded for every wager you place! A percentage of your total bets — up to 3% — is returned as Rakeback, ensuring consistent play pays off. Keep playing to maximize your earnings, and supercharge your rewards with the Booster Mechanism!
rakeback.howIsBonusCalculatedDesc: Your Rakeback is instantly vested and made available to claim from your bonus pool based on the amount wagered across different game types, multiplied by your Rakeback rate. The more you wager, the quicker you unlock your rewards.
rakeback.rakebackDesc1: Boosters double your Rakeback for one hour! You get one every time a referral makes a deposit. Stack them to keep the bonus going even longer!
rakeback.rakebackDesc2: Want to maximize your earnings? Activate a booster when you're ready to rake in the rewards!
rakeback.generalTermsDesc1: Rewards are calculated and credited in USDT, then displayed in your preferred fiat currency for convenience. Please note, currency conversions are approximate.
rakeback.generalTermsDesc2: The casino reserves the right to modify or revoke  eligibility at any time, without the obligation to justify. Any abuse or fraudulent activity will lead to disqualification from the promotion.

redeemPromoCode.title: Redeem Promo Code
redeemPromoCode.description: Unlock exclusive rewards, discounts, or bonuses by redeeming your promo code!
